original_title: Guidable - A Verdadeira História do Ratos de Porão
overview: The uncensored history from the Brazilian band Ratos de Porão, one of the oldest Hardcore bands in the world. Almost three decades of drugs, madness and a lot of noise, told by the people who made and still make part of this institution of heavy rock.
tagline: Almost 30 years of drugs, madness and a lot of noise!
title: Guidable - The Real History of Ratos de Porão
